name: T.U.I. Gun
description:
T.U.I. Gun (full name, The Ultimate Impossible Gun) is a game made for MizJam 1, where all the entries have to use the same spritesheet. 

Cursed by an evil mage, you must fight through a serie of arenas . 

The original idea of the game is to use as many sprites from the sheet as possible, normally throughout the impossible guns you find along the way adventure.

Source: https://gitlab.com/uspgamedev/mizjam2020/
